{{infobox character | people=[[Númenóreans|Númenórean]] | name=Almarian | image=Matěj Čadil - A Royal Wedding in Numenor.jpg | caption="A Royal Wedding in [[Númenor]]" by [[Matěj Čadil]] | pronun= | othernames= | titles=Queen of Númenor | position= | location=[[Númenor]] | affiliation= | language=[[Adûnaic]], [[Sindarin]] and [[Quenya]] | birth=Before {{SA|700}} | birthlocation= | rule={{SA|740}} - {{SA|883|n}} (143 years) | death=After {{SA|900}} | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage=[[Vëantur]] | siblings= | spouse=[[Tar-Meneldur]] | children=[[Tar-Aldarion|Anardil]], [[Ailinel]] and [[Almiel]] | gender=Female | height= | hair=Golden | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Almarian''' ([[Quenya|Q]], pron. {{IPA|[alˈmari.an]}}) was the daughter of [[Vëantur]],{{UT|Wife}} Queen to [[Tar-Meneldur]], the fifth King of [[Númenor]], and mother to [[Tar-Aldarion]], the sixth King, and to [[Ailinel]] and [[Almiel]]. She was said to possess great beauty.{{UT|earlier}} ==Etymology== ''Almarian'' is a [[Quenya]] name. Its meaning is not glossed, but Paul Strack suggests it contains ''[[almare]]'' ("blessedness").{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-1562159121.html|articlename=Q.
